data.title: Past Featured Speakers
data.text:
Steve Case is one of Americaâs best-known and most accomplished entrepreneurs and philanthropists, and a pioneer in making the Internet part of everyday life. Â Case co-founded AOL in 1985 and under his leadership and vision, AOL became the largest and most valuable Internet company, driving the worldwide adoption of a medium that has transformed business and society.

Case is Chairman and CEO of Revolution LLC, a Washington, D.C.- based investment firm that partners with visionary entrepreneurs to build significant âbuilt to lastâ businesses. Â In 2014, Steve and Revolution launched the Rise of the Rest, a platform to shine a spotlight on entrepreneurs that are starting and scaling businesses outside of Silicon Valley, New York, and Boston.

Steveâs passion for helping entrepreneurs remains his driving force. In 2011, he was the founding chair of the Startup America Partnershipâan effort launched at the White House to accelerate high-growth entrepreneurship throughout the nationâand member of President Obamaâs Council on Jobs and Competitiveness where he chaired the subcommittee on entrepreneurship.

Case serves as Chairman of the Case Foundation, which he established with his wife Jean in 1997

He is also the author of New York Times bestselling book, The Third Wave: An Entrepreneurâs Vision of the Future.
